name: Get off Uranus
description:
Armed only with a jetpack and his trusty blaster, Captain Berk must avoid aliens, spikes, and bottomless pits to escape Uranus

Controls:

Z - Jump / Double jump

X - Fire

Created in a couple of days for 8 bits to infinity 2 button jam.

Contains the following from 3rd parties:

Custom font: Press Start 2p https://www.dafont.com/press-start-2p.font

Sound effects: Little Robot Sound Factory https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/8-bit-sfx-32831

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
